title: Can you get the Gift Of Magic icon with rp?
body: It said that you do get it when gifting useing rp but i havnt gotten it yet.. Confused?

replies.body: You'll still be getting that icon ^_^! It can take a little while for all the icons to go out, but they will all be sent out within 2 weeks of the [**promotion ending**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions) (April 26th)
